member.name: IStorageItemHandleAccess.Create
member.summary: Creates a handle to a file.
member.param: The level of access that a handle has on the file.
The requested sharing mode of the handle.
The flags of the file handle.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IStorageItemHandleAccess
member.summary: Provides access to the operating system handle of a storage file.
